Whenever you cast a spell, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature or discard a card.

Legion [i](When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.)[/i]
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a token that's a copy of this creature. If this creature is attacking, the token enters tapped and attacking. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

Search your library for an artifact card, a creature card, an enchantment card, a land card, and a planeswalker card. An opponent chooses one of them. Exile the chosen card, then put the rest onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Atros was sewn by a celestial being more powerful than its ten gods combined. There would be more worlds in its vision, though perhaps none as tragic.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Effigy {2}{WU} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Vaelias enters or you attack with two or more creatures, exile up to one other target nonland permanent. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
When Vaelias dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

Effigy {2}{UB} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Sythor enters or you attack with two or more creatures, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library, then choose a card exiled with Sythor. You may play that card from exile as long as you control a legendary enchantment or a God.
When Sythor dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

Effigy {1}{BR} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Velera enters or you attack with two or more creatures, the owner of target permanent an opponent controls sacrifices it unless they have Velera deal 2 damage to them.
When Velera dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

Effigy {3}{RG} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Ozhka enters or you attack with two or more creatures, add {R}{R}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. You can only cast one more spell this turn.
When Ozhka dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

Effigy {3}{GW} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever Marisyn enters or you attack with two or more creatures, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
When Marisyn dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

[+2]: Create a 3/3 white and black Angel creature token with flying.
[+1]: Exile target legendary permanent.
